Text: ALLIANCE DIGEST ISSUE November THE RICE ALLIANCE FOR TECHNOLOGY AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP A Strategic Alliance among the Schools of Engineering Management and Natural Sciences at Rice University DIGEST ISSUE No November Alliance web site WELCOME to the Rice Alliance Digest an enewsletter which notifies you of upcoming events and items of interest to subscribers REMINDER Tomorrow evening NOVEMBER Wednesday PM to PM Business Thought Leader Speaker Series Networking Event Featuring Dr Arati Prabhakar who will speak on New Technological Trends and the Investment Climate for Commercialization A View from Silicon Valleys Sand Hill Road PM Registration PM Presentation PM QA Buffet Dinner Reception Herring Hall Rice University Campus RSVP users Cost Free admission for Rice Alliance members for nonmembers ALSO NOTE The Rice Alliance is proud to be a Supporting Organization for the second annual Southwest Biotech Venture Conference and Symposium which will be held at the Houston Hyatt Regency Hotel in downtown Houston on December The event combines a venture educational symposium with an opportunity for linking investors and related financial organizations with select ventures in biotechnology healthcare services medical devices and life sciences December th is a fullday educational program with presentations by leaders in the Texas biotech and life science industry December th will feature presentations from select ventures to an audience including venture capitalists corporate investors angel investors and related service providers December th will also feature a keynote address by Governor Rick Perry To sign up for the event go to bioswregasp The Rice Alliance has arranged for a unique opportunity for our members to attend the kickoff reception only if you wish for a special admission price of To sign up only for the kickoff reception send your registration information from the above page which should include your name company mailing address phone fax and email to Virginia Rothenflue at then you may pay your via check or credit card no cash please at the door We look forward to hosting you Remember if you have a new business idea which you would like to present please email us at or write to us at Rice Alliance for Technology and Entrepreneurship Jones Graduate School of Management Rice University MS S Main Street Houston Texas USA voice fax TO UNSUBSCRIBE TO THE RICE ALLIANCE DIGEST send your request to Trish Leggett Program Coordinator Rice Alliance for Technology Entrepreneurship Rice University MS South Main Street
